articles.title: Mastercard Incorporated (MA) Partners with LoanPro to Offer Loan on Card
articles.mainIdea: Mastercard Incorporated (MA) Partners with LoanPro to Offer Loan on Card
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Mastercard Incorporated (MA) Partners with LoanPro to Offer Loan on Card. Mastercard Inc. (NYSE:MA) is one of the best forever stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On December 16, Mastercard Inc. (NYSE:MA) announced a strategic partnership with LoanPro to launch Loan on Card. The solution is designed to make it easier for lenders to deliver loans to approved consumer and small business borrowers through virtual […]
